chapters.title: Chapter 5:  The Forging of a Hammer
chapters.info:
Long Tooth,
      p. 169 (193)â€”Name the
      wolves give to Elyas Machera; the name is used
      because of the long knife Elyas uses to hunt with, which the wolves
      see as a long metal tooth.
      See
      Machera, Elyas.
